reviews.review: Good but Among us is better
I play this game way too much and love it even though it has it's bugs, and a toxic community lowkey.

One star. What I saw of the game during the tutorial and bot matches was meh, but the playerbase is so toxic and terrible that I only stuck around for a half hour before wanting to refund the damn thing. Play with friends unless you've got a secret kink for being shit on by the community.
Holy bajoli - this game is so great!  It's not perfect, but it's changing all the time, and I'd say for the better.  I highly recommend it!
Hate this game but can't stop playing it for some reason. pls help....

I will never recommend this game in it's current state.
The developers are clueless and have no idea what they are doing.

Their brand new skill based matchmaking is the most broken thing you will ever see in your life, YES it's worse that league of legends.

I have around 60 hours played as a killer and 60 as survivor.
If I queue as a killer, I get matchmaking at it's finest, only 1.5k hours survivors at least.

This is the only game I know of that pushes new players the F**k away from the game as soon as possible.

DO NOT! I REPEAT! DO NOT PURCHASE THIS GAME AND PLAY IT!
It's a nice chill, spooky game. I like that its the one game i can sit back and play, doesnt havent to be try harded, forehead to the screen. though you will find the occasional try hard
Great game to play with neegas
wish I would have known about this game forever ago, It is a literal masterpiece.
Game definitely has it's flaws, but I really enjoy it, especially with friends.
I only play this because my friends play it, and even then it is not fun.

i wish i could recommend and not recommend at the same time because i love this game i play daily, but it does suck you in and can easily become a toxic relationship. or maybe thats just me idk but :D

Halloween is coming up and you want something spooky, look somewhere else unless you enjoy watching your player character be murdered over and over after because you arent on voice with 3 other friends against the killer. This game is "balanced" toward competitive players which means if your casual, you will loose a majority of the time. What does it mean to be competitive? 2000 hours of grinding the game so you can compete with players who spent all the extra time or money to get the "meta" perks.

WARNING this looks like a fun game to play (acctually is sometimes) but holy cow. The MMR system and matchmaking is broken. and i mean hardcore broken. Its not even funny anymore. 

Personally i played this game for like 40h now and i am not the best and not the worst player. my rank last season was gold 3 so i am kinda at the middle i guess ( Killer player) 

The problem is if I play 6 matches its 

1 match against a low MMR team ( i win with 0 gens done wich is acctually boring af)
1 Match against players who are as good as me ( usually hard game with 2 kills)
AND THEN
4 matches against RANK1 (probably group) who acctually destroy me. 

the last 3 games i played i hooked 1 person after the 4th gen popped. and it was legit the only down i had in three games. 

in my point of view if the developers fix this probem it would be a nice game to play.
but i would strongly reccomend  you to spend your money andtime to better things.

if the devs change or fix anything i will deleat or change my comment.

But the developer just dont care about the player base

If the game is on sale for 10$ buy it. Dont however purchase the game and think it is A - competitive or B - FUN for hours. Its fun for a match (maybe two) and then you come across shitty people for far too long. At which point you have to decided do I DC and take the timeout or do i fuck over the reset of my team and go AFK (as survivor). If you wish to be a shitty killer and have the support of the devs backing you. This is the game for you!

(weak killers need to facecamp or patrol a certain area for kills tunneling isnt what a killer should do) Humans gen rushing like crazy this patch makes the game so not fun to be played as killers, DBD is killing new players to trying out to play the killer role.

DbD (=Dead by Daylight) ist ein tolles Multiplayerspiel, welches neben seinem interessantem und einzigartigem Spielprinzip und Design, welches sowohl das Spielen in der Gruppe als auch den Einzelnen f√∂rdert und anspricht, eine gewisse Einfachheit aber auch Komplexit√§t beinhaltet.                                                                                             Es bietet au√üerdem ein gutes Levelsystem, in welchem man durch stetigen Spielfortschritt bessere F√§higkeiten und Mechanismen erlernt.                                                                                                                                         Die kostenpflichtigen Avatare, der √úberlebenden- und J√§gergruppe, sowie manche Spielstile (campen, tunnel etc..) sprechen weniger f√ºr das Spiel. 
Alles in Allem w√ºrde ich das Spiel dennoch klar empfehlen.
